mapper.select: SELECT a.read_num AS read_num, a.fans_num AS fans_num, a.like_num AS like_num, a.rank_num AS rank_num, a.create_date AS create_date,a.plantform FROM result_data a WHERE a.plantform = #{plantform} AND a.create_date >= #{start_date} AND #{end_date} >= a.create_date GROUP BY DATE_FORMAT(a.create_date, '%Y-%m-%d'), a.plantform ORDER BY a.create_date ASC;

SELECT * FROM (SELECT * FROM spider_data ORDER BY create_date DESC LIMIT 1000000000000000) a WHERE a.plantform = #{plantform} AND a.create_date >= #{start_date} AND #{end_date} >= a.create_date GROUP BY DATE_FORMAT(a.create_date, '%Y-%m-%d'), a.plantform ORDER BY a.create_date ASC;
